settings.text: 10% OFF your first order | Use code: FUN10

settings.heading: DO YOU ALLOW RETURNS?
settings.row_content: Returns for cosmetic products are not accepted. However, if the product is damaged, misplaced by us, or if the wrong product is sent to you, we will facilitate a return and send you the correct product.

settings.heading: WHEN WILL MY ORDER SHIP?
settings.row_content: All domestic orders, once processed are shipped within 7 working days.

settings.heading: CAN I TRACK MY ORDER?
settings.row_content:
You can track the progress of your existing or past orders by visiting the “My Orders” section of your account.

You will be able to track your order from our website or via a tracking link sent to you as soon as the order is shipped.

If your order has been shipped and you still cannot track it, we would request you to wait for 12 hours before trying again.

In rare cases, it might take the courier partner longer to generate a tracking link.

settings.heading: DO YOU TEST FUN FORMULAE PRODUCTS ON ANIMALS?
settings.row_content: We do not test on animals. All Fun Formulae products are Cruelty-free.

settings.heading: DO FUN FORMULAE PRODUCTS CONTAIN PARABENS?
settings.row_content: No, Fun Formulae products are free from sulfates, phthalates and parabens.

settings.heading: CAN I USE THESE PRODUCTS ON SENSITIVE SKIN?
settings.row_content: Our products are suitable to use on all skin types including sensitive skin but a patch test is recommended.

settings.text: "I'm amazed by this body butter! Its silky smooth texture glides effortlessly, and the scent is heavenly, leaving my skin deeply nourished and irresistibly fragrant. A luxurious treat indeed for my nightcare regime!"
settings.author: Anju dave

settings.text: "This body yogurt is a game-changer! It hydrates deeply without feeling greasy, leaves my skin incredibly soft all day and the aroma is divine—a refreshing and nourishing delight every time!"
settings.author: Aditi jain

settings.text: This shampoo is amazing! I've experienced visibly less hair fall and a healthier scalp. My hair feels incredibly soft and bouncy. Plus, the lingering floral smell keeps me feeling refreshed all day. Truly transformative for my hair !"
settings.author: Aakriti ganesh

settings.text: "This conditioner effortlessly transforms my hair, leaving it unbelievably soft and nourished. A little goes a long way, making it a staple in my hair care routine. I love the luxurious aroma of ylang-ylang keeping my hair smell so fresh. Highly recommended for anyone seeking luscious locks!"
settings.author: Anjali tamhankar

settings.text: I have been using this face scrub n pack duo for 4 months now. It's very convenient and effective. The gentle scrub is perfect for my delicate skin and the pack is so hydrating it keeps my skin plump. The feeling after using this product is so nice, never come across such a gentle and nourishing scrub.
settings.author: Haifa

settings.text: This sunscreen has a very mild delightful scent, blends easily in the skin and I can feel the difference like an umbrella over my skin.
settings.author: Shivani bapna

settings.text: This is so yummy and so good_ _ _ like jam! The gentle exfoliation of this body scrub makes my skin smooth and soft to the touch. It is so nourishing and hydrating that I can feel my skin moisturised.
settings.author: Neha

settings.text: This toner is so heavenly, like an instant refreshing drink for my skin.  It deeply hydrates my skin and adds a healthy glow! Super good!!
settings.author: Uditha

settings.text: It is so mild yet so effective !!!!!!! I can see visible reduction in my acne. Due to my beard  its difficult to apply any products but this acne gel is so smooth it gets absorbed instantly, not noticeable at all and works wonders on my skin.
settings.author: Kabir kothari

settings.text: I have been using this face wash for two months now and can see visibly calm skin. My menopausal acne stressed me so much and this face wash is so delicate _ _ _ it cleanses my skin leaving it hydrated and nourished. I love the instant healthy glow it adds to my skin.
settings.author: Hiru asudani

settings.text: this refreshing body wash keeps me feeling fresh. My skin feels hydrated and nourished after using this. It balances my skin without making it dry.
settings.author: Kewal chholak
